text: The 2017 EMF Euro was the eighth edition of the EMF miniEURO for national Small-sided football teams, and the fifth governed by the European Minifootball Federation. It took place in Brno, Czech Republic, from 9 to 17 June 2017.http://www.cck-brno.cz/clanek-archiv-20-2017-390-archiv-2017-emf- euro-2017--mala- kopana.htmlhttp://trnava.topliga.sk/50/article/id/7859http://is.futbalito.com/cs/eumf/minieuro/emfeuro2017/Clanek/7862 The final tournament was contested by 24 teams. == Draw == The final tournament draw was held in Hotel Bobycentrum in Brno on 29 March 2017. ==Group stage== {| class="wikitable" !Key to colours in group tables |- |bgcolor="#ccffcc"| Team advanced to the knockout stage |} ===Group
